# This is an example, using TurboGears 0.9

-f http://www.turbogears.org/preview/download/index.html
-f http://peak.telecommunity.com/snapshots

TurboJson >= 0.9.1
TurboKid >= 0.9.3
CherryPy >= 2.2.0
simplejson >= 1.1
SQLObject >= 0.7.1dev_r1457
elementtree >= 1.2.6
cElementTree >= 1.0.5
PasteScript >= 0.5
FormEncode >= 0.4
setuptools >= 0.6a11
RuleDispatch
nose >= 0.8
